lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about Cristiano Ronaldo’s strong play in leading Manchester United to a 3-1 victory over Arsenal to reach a second successive European Champions League soccer final referred incorrectly to his offensive production in two previous European matches. In the first one, against Porto, he scored on a shot during open play, not on a free kick. In the second game, also against Arsenal, he had no goals; he did not score on a free kick.
